data.actual_result: You can't, you have to actually tap/hold above the message, which does not happen to regular text messages
data.expected_result: You can bring up the context menu to copy/edit/delete etc.
data.short_description: You are not able to bring up the context menu if you try to tap/hold on a URL, and you actually have to do it above the link near the timestamp
data.steps_to_repro: - Post an URL - Attempt to bring up the context menu to copy/edit/delete etc
